Title: Cortelafolk 2026: 3rd Folk Music Festival in Cortelazor
Description: Cortelafolk 2026 returns to Cortelazor (Sierra de Huelva) from April 17–19 with live folk music, workshops, film screenings, craft market and free entry. Discover the full line-up and plan your spring getaway.
Keywords: Cortelafolk 2026, folk music festival Spain, Cortelazor festival, Sierra de Huelva events, spring music festival Andalusia, live music April 2026 Spain, Monstruo Laberinto, Soleá Gatica, free entry festival Spain, rural tourism Andalusia, La Mano Verde Arte y Naturaleza
